data.text: Wisdom guarded to the end the first formed father of the world, that was created alone,
And gave him strength to get dominion over all things.
But when an unrighteous man fell away from her in his anger,
And when for his cause the earth was drowning with a flood,
Moreover, when nations consenting together in wickedness had been confounded,
While the ungodly were perishing, Gr. she  wisdom delivered a righteous man,
To whose wickedness a smoking waste still witnesseth,
For having passed wisdom by,
But wisdom delivered out of troubles those that waited on her.
When a righteous man was a fugitive from a brotherâ€™s wrath, Gr. she.  wisdom guided him in straight paths;
When in their covetousness men  dealt hardly with him,
She guarded him from enemies,
When a righteous man was sold, Gr. she.  wisdom forsook him not,
And in bonds she left him not,
Wisdom delivered a holy people and a blameless seed from a nation of oppressors.
She entered into the soul of a servant of the Lord,
She rendered unto holy men a reward of their toils;
She brought them over the Red sea,
But their enemies she drowned,
Therefore the righteous spoiled the ungodly;
Because wisdom opened the mouth of the dumb,
